name: HawkingRadiation.IO
description:
This is my submission to the Jame Gam IO edition game jam.

To put it lightly, this is a piece of garbage. I'm extremely bummed that I had something else going on in the period of the jam, though I probably could have put a little bit more effort into it.

The theme was "Time kills you", and I had a fantastic idea! I immediately thought about black holes and HAWKING RADIATION which mysteriously causes black holes to evaporate. Maybe I'll come back to this idea in the future, but for now, this is what I have.

Move with your mouse, get the mystery particles and be careful not to fade away at the hand of HAWKING RADIATION.
